A demonstration of the transition between weather and climate by averaging daily rainfall and daily temperature over England over longer and longer timescales
Graphs on left show lower range of climate, those on right the trend.

#dataviz #climatechange #globalwarming #rstats https://t.co/szKSZyoWqh

Averaging daily temperature data over longer periods reveals underlying warming trend over England.

This is a less complicated version of previous #dataviz, I'm interested if is more accessible?

#GlobalWarming #ClimateChange #rstats https://t.co/lso0z6TwWv
